title: Collaborative Knowledge-Building Learning Design for Online Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using basic online learning platforms and foundational concepts in elementary science education
context.additional_context: In-service elementary teachers develop science education expertise through blended online-offline activities in a BYOD environment, with continuous formative feedback and emphasis on participant interaction and knowledge construction

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three science education strategies through collaborative knowledge-building activities within online communities
Learners can share case studies where they resolved two common issues in science experiment design through role division with peer teachers
Learners can achieve over 60% participation in knowledge-deepening stages (analysis, evaluation, creation) during online discussions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
